abstract: Times writers are answering reader questions about how to pay for continuing education, and which training programs can put students on the right career path.
snippet: Times writers are answering reader questions about how to pay for continuing education, and which training programs can put students on the right career path.
lead_paragraph: Update | 1:17 p.m., August 21. Sorry, we are no longer accepting new readers questions on this subject. To see the questions we have answered so far, go here.
